title: How to Buy a Book on a Kindle: iOS, Android, Windows & More

steps.title: Launch the “App Store” from the app tray of your iOS device.
steps.content: Launch the “App Store” from the app tray of your iOS device.

steps.title: Type “Kindle” into the search box of App Store, then tap on “Kindle” in search results.
steps.content: Type “Kindle” into the search box of App Store, then tap on “Kindle” in search results.

steps.title: Tap on “Install.
steps.content: Tap on “Install. ” The Kindle app will download and install itself on your iOS device, and display in the app tray when complete.

steps.title: Tap on the Kindle icon.
steps.content: Tap on the Kindle icon. This will open the reading app on your device.

steps.title: Sign in with your Amazon account information, or select the option to create an Amazon account.
steps.content: Sign in with your Amazon account information, or select the option to create an Amazon account. You must have an Amazon account to use the Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Launch the Internet browser on your iOS device and navigate to the Kindle Store website.
steps.content: Launch the Internet browser on your iOS device and navigate to the Kindle Store website. iPad: Navigate to https://www.amazon.com/ipad-Kindle-Store/s?k=ipad&rh=n%3A133140011 . iPhone or iPod Touch: Navigate to https://www.amazon.com/kindlemobilestore .

steps.title: Sign into the Kindle Store using your Amazon account login credentials.
steps.content: Sign into the Kindle Store using your Amazon account login credentials.

steps.title: Browse and search for books you want to buy for the Kindle reading app.
steps.content: Browse and search for books you want to buy for the Kindle reading app. You can browse bestsellers, daily deals, or new releases, or search for specific titles.

steps.title: Tap on the book you want to purchase, then tap on “Buy now.
steps.content: Tap on the book you want to purchase, then tap on “Buy now. ”

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase. After the purchase is complete, Amazon will deliver and sync the book to your Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Tap on “Read now.
steps.content: Tap on “Read now. ” The book will open and display in your Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Tap on the “Play Store” icon from the app tray of your Android phone or tablet.
steps.content: Tap on the “Play Store” icon from the app tray of your Android phone or tablet.

steps.title: Type “Kindle” into the search box of Play Store, then tap on “Kindle” in search results.
steps.content: Type “Kindle” into the search box of Play Store, then tap on “Kindle” in search results.

steps.title: Tap on “Install.
steps.content: Tap on “Install. ” The Kindle app will download and install itself on your Android, and display in the app tray when complete.

steps.title: Tap on the Kindle icon to launch the Kindle reading app.
steps.content: Tap on the Kindle icon to launch the Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Tap on “Start Reading,” then sign into your Amazon account.
steps.content: Tap on “Start Reading,” then sign into your Amazon account. You must have an Amazon account to use the Kindle reading app. If you do not have an Amazon account, select the option to create an account, then follow the on-screen instructions to set up an account.

steps.title: Tap on the “Kindle Store” icon from the Home screen of the Kindle reading app.
steps.content: Tap on the “Kindle Store” icon from the Home screen of the Kindle reading app. This will take you directly to the Kindle Store so you can browse and buy books.

steps.title: Browse and search for books you want to buy for your Android.
steps.content: Browse and search for books you want to buy for your Android. You can browse bestsellers, daily deals, or new releases, or search for specific titles.

steps.title: Tap on the book you want to purchase, then tap on “Buy now.
steps.content: Tap on the book you want to purchase, then tap on “Buy now. ”

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase. After the purchase is complete, Amazon will deliver and sync the book to your Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Tap on the back button to return to the Home screen of your Kindle app.
steps.content: Tap on the back button to return to the Home screen of your Kindle app. The book you purchased will now be displayed on the Home screen.

steps.title: Tap on the book title.
steps.content: Tap on the book title. The book will open and display in your Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Navigate to Amazon’s website on your Windows computer at and click on “Kindle for PC.
steps.content: Navigate to Amazon’s website on your Windows computer at and click on “Kindle for PC. ” If using Mac OS X, navigate to https://www.amazon.com/gp/digital/fiona/kcp-landing-page?ie=UTF8&ref_=kcp_mac_mkt_lnd and click on “Download Now.”

steps.title: Select the option to save the Kindle app installation file to your desktop.
steps.content: Select the option to save the Kindle app installation file to your desktop.

steps.title: Double-click on the installation file, then follow the on-screen instructions to install the Kindle app on your computer.
steps.content: Double-click on the installation file, then follow the on-screen instructions to install the Kindle app on your computer.

steps.title: Launch the Kindle app when installation is complete, then click on “Tools” and select “Options.”
steps.content: Launch the Kindle app when installation is complete, then click on “Tools” and select “Options.”

steps.title: Click on “Registration,” then click on “Register.
steps.content: Click on “Registration,” then click on “Register. ”

steps.title: Sign into the Kindle app using your Amazon account login credentials.
steps.content: Sign into the Kindle app using your Amazon account login credentials. You must have an Amazon account to read books using the Kindle app. If you do not have an Amazon account, select the option to register for an account, then follow the on-screen instructions to set up an account.

steps.title: Click on “Shop in Kindle Store.
steps.content: Click on “Shop in Kindle Store. ” The Kindle reading app will take you directly to the Kindle Store so you can browse and purchase books.

steps.title: Sign into the Kindle Store using your Amazon login credentials.
steps.content: Sign into the Kindle Store using your Amazon login credentials.

steps.title: Browse and search for books you want purchased for the Kindle reading app.
steps.content: Browse and search for books you want purchased for the Kindle reading app. You can browse bestsellers, daily deals, or new releases, or search for specific titles.

steps.title: Click on the book you want to purchase, select “Deliver to,” then click on either “Kindle for PC” or “Kindle for Mac.
steps.content: Click on the book you want to purchase, select “Deliver to,” then click on either “Kindle for PC” or “Kindle for Mac. ”

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to enter your payment information and complete your purchase. After the purchase is complete, Amazon will deliver and sync the book to your Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Tap on the book title from the Home screen of the Kindle reading app.
steps.content: Tap on the book title from the Home screen of the Kindle reading app. The book you purchased will open and display on-screen. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Try updating the OS on your computer or device if you are unable to download and install the Kindle reading app.
steps.content: Try updating the OS on your computer or device if you are unable to download and install the Kindle reading app. The Kindle reading app may not be compatible with earlier versions of iOS, Android, Windows, Mac OS X, and Blackberry.

steps.title: Verify that your device or computer is connected to a wireless or data network if you are unable to install apps or download books to your device.
steps.content: Verify that your device or computer is connected to a wireless or data network if you are unable to install apps or download books to your device. An Internet connection is required to purchase books for the Kindle reading app.

steps.title: Tap or click on “Menu” and select “Sync” from within the Kindle reading app if books you’ve purchased do not show up in the Kindle app.
steps.content: Tap or click on “Menu” and select “Sync” from within the Kindle reading app if books you’ve purchased do not show up in the Kindle app. In some cases, the Kindle reading app may fail to sync with Amazon automatically after you’ve purchased new reading material.
